name: Mr. Blue
description:
[ A game made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare #39 ]

Mr. Blue is finally here!

The city is running out of power due to its sad and cranky citizens. Mr. Blue is here to empower the city with his go to attitude and hip moves. 

- How to Play -

Use the corresponding hip gesture and make the civilians happy thus providing power the city. Any civilian who crosses the bridge sad/mad will cause the city power (represented by the red bar at the top) to deplete faster. 

- Controls -

  • Arrow Keys - Movement 
  • 1 Key - High-Five
  • 2 Key - Fist-Bump
  • 3 Key - Handshake
  • Space Bar - restart (in case of glitches or bugs)
  • Escape Key - Quit (when in level)

- Tools -

  • Unity
  • Toon Boom Animation
  • Photoshop

- Credits -

  • Code by Carl Vitasa
  • Art and Animation by Conrad Lee
  • Music: Rhapsody in Blue courtesy of archive.org
